channel.title: Hello, want to move npc'es body
channel.description:
I made a High priest mob to yell text and there is portal in front of it, i want priest to face to portal, it looks to anotherway, i did that monk like this: spawn = 216 2861 3593 0 0 0 0 0 0 StationaryNPC
So, it looks to wrong way! portal is on other side
Please answer and Merry Christmas!

item.title: Hello, want to move npc'es body
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

u dont control the way it faces in autospawn…

in npchandler where its spawned
have it like

if(npc[i] == 216) {
npcs.npc[i].turnto(npc.absX-1, npc.absY);
}

idk…

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, want to move npc'es body

item.title: Hello, want to move npc'es body
item.dc:creator: @punch punch
item.description:
@punch wrote:

Im not 100% sure but one of the 0’s defines which way the NPC faces.
Just make a copy of the original file and just keep changing the 0’s.
Hope this helped.
-Punch
